content.content: Hello, Do you consider the creation of a parallel and exclusive UNI token interesting for the members of the Governance? In my opinion, it could be a good option, to differentiate the current UNI token with a Governance token. What do you think?
content.GPT-summary: The author is proposing the creation of a parallel and exclusive UNI token for the members of the Governance and is asking for feedback on the idea. The proposal is explained briefly, and a constructive criticism of the proposal is given.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
Author of proposal is explaining proposal
